about_the_game:
"They dreamt about you last night in their worst nightmares. It's your time to shine, Terry. You are their Augury of Death."

Augurium Mortis is a fast-paced top-down arena shooter where you control Amy Sol, a fighter hovercraft ace pilot singled out and cornered by her sworn enemies.

She has nothing to loose and will fight to the death in a deep jungle located in a dystopian world in a planet far away into the future.

Features

Gameplay

                   

  • Fend off waves of mechs and large robots trying with your weapon arsenal.

  • Load up your charge by killing enemies, special moves grant you more energy.

  • Unleash your ultra to deal devastating blows to the enemy

Music

John Black

Different types of enemies

                  

  • Mech Soldier (R-11): a fast and nimble robot with a sword that will pressure you relentlessly. It's not a real mech, the manufacturer name it like that for marketing purposes.

  • Mech Tank: A fast large mech with a thick skin that can take a punch. Beware of it's AoE attack.

  • Sniper Vehicle: A mid range war tank with a precision shot.

  • Rocket Launcher: A long range barrage missile launcher that won't stop putting pressure on you until you take it out

Unlockables

Complete tasks to fully unleash the power of your arsenal by unlocking new weapons and parts and optimize your destruction power to infinity.

short_description: A distant world in a dystopian future, separated from her squad Amy Sol finds herself being ambushed by enemy forces looking for revenge. Pilot her nimble hovercraft to blow up as many mechs as possible in this fast-paced arena top-down shooter.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Serbian
